body.description: Saugella dermoliquide is a gentle cleansing emulsion for daily intimate hygiene. It contains natural extracts of Sage to calm the itching and ensure a daily hygiene gently. Its physiological pH respects the vaginal flora.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a fantastic va jay jay soap.
reviews.reviewText: Great ph balanced soap for down under and my husband even lives how I smell after. Feels soft and non harmful in any way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, I’ve used it for almost 40 years! Good price
reviews.reviewText: Best product ever for intimate hygiene, or whole body. You can actually wash your hair with this as it has a neutral PH. But you’d need a good conditioner afterwards.I’ve used this product for almost 40 years, since I was in my teens, and any time I’ve steer away from it (fir any reason), I regretted it cause my body (parts) need that neutral PH. I was born and lived overseas my first 30 years, and this brand has a full line of products there now, including men and teens. (Growing up this one was it).I am reviewing the item above, as shipping was pretty fast, price is decent, you get two large bottles. I’ve searched far and wide and this was the cheapest one. I used to buy from an online pharmacy that had it a lot cheaper, but they no longer carry it.Pretty satisfied. You should definitely try it, especially if you need a little extra help during your period. Shake before use, you only need a small amount, so it last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I DON’T RECOMMEND THIS!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I regret buying this!!!!!It’s not the same saugella I used to buy in Italy!!!!The color, the smell and the consistency are not right!!!!! I used it once and it feels totally different (wrong), there is no sage in it, no fresh feeling!!!Very disappointed!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle cleanser and great vendor
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Saugella for "intimate cleansing" for years and recommend it very highly. It's very, very gentle yet leaves a clean, healthy feeling. Or, more accurately, leaves no feeling at all, which "down there" is what you want. This time I bought it from Cosme World France, and it was shipped from France beautifully wrapped in secure but not wasteful packaging. Also, Cosme World France supports Flower PowHer, a charity that provides feminine hygiene products to women in need. With so many homeless and refugee women in so many countries, it's nice to know my purchase does a little something to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, fast shipping
reviews.reviewText: Arrived more quickly than promised directly from France. Well packaged. The Saugella blue line is an excellent product that I used to stock up on during yearly pre-COVID trips to Paris.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: The product arrived very well packed. The seller even put a card and a small gift inside.Seller highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The delivery is faster than expectedAnd it even gave me a free tote bag :)Good product and service
